actions.description: Clears the settings and reverts to default settings.

constraints: SSH profiling is supported for MAC OSX endpoints only.
If the number of discovered devices exceeds 1000, subnets must be added manually to scan only Windows devices.

errors.message: SSH Connection failed, while performing SSH scan.
errors.trigger: Invalid credentials or network issues during SSH scan.

errors.message: SSH Command Failed, while performing SSH scan.
errors.trigger: Command execution error during SSH scan.

workflows.name: SSH Profiling Workflow
steps: Navigate to Profiler -> Profiler Configuration -> Advance Configuration.
Optionally, enable profiling for all discovered devices using SSH.
Test credentials by entering Endpoint IP or hostname.
prerequisites: Ensure SSH is enabled on the target devices.
Ensure valid administrator or RSA credentials are available.
